item.title: Congratulations, Dr. Zhang
item.description: Congratulations to Xiao Zhang for successfully defending his PhD thesis! Dr. Zhang and his PhD committee: Somesh Jha (University of Wisconsin), David Evans, Tom Fletcher; Tianxi Li (UVA Statistics), David Wu (UT Austin), Mohammad Mahmoody; Xiao Zhang. Xiao will join the CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security in Saarbr√ºcken, Germany this fall as a tenure-track faculty member. From Characterizing Intrinsic Robustness to Adversarially Robust Machine Learning The prevalence of adversarial examples raises questions about the reliability of machine learning systems, especially for their deployment in critical applications.
